post.body: Got S.M. Stirling's "The Sunrise Lands" in the mail 2day. Maybe reading it will cheer me up...
Next, will restore backup image. If still not work, will reinstall. *Sigh*
Is frustrated. Tablet is not working properly, hangs/freezes on desktop, won't connect, won't load startup items. Restore points several ...
♖: Pretty sure I bombed my ACCT 252 Test. Have to get at least a C-, so may have to retake next quarter. :(
Decided not to take the ECON final, which is optional, because I'm already getting an A. So only two finals to worry about.
Oh, Megaupload, how I despise you and everything associated with you. I have NOT exceeded my download quota for the day, dammit!
♖: Last regular test finished! Now I just have worry about finals.
☛: My Battle with the Virtumonde trojan. http://tinyurl.com/5wd2d6
Been putting off finishing the dress, will finish over Winter Break.
Thanksgiving Shopping done, 2 Free Turkeys donated to the food bank.
Decided to buy 3rd battery, for stress-free cordlessness...
restore point is a life-saver, but it's habit of deleting exes and rolling back ini files is kind of irritating....
Well, I'm still an hour short on long days, so will only be able to be cord-free on short days...
Got my second battery last night. Trying to go cord free, we'll see how it goes...
☛: Man Submits Drawing Of Spider Instead Of Payment For Overdue Account - ROFL. :D http://tinyurl.com/6lfd2q
Switched from Rainmeter 2 Samurize. Lower mem & CPU usage.
♖: Did really well on ECON test. Only missed one question. ☺

OMG! We Won! ✌
And Fujitsu, your so-called recovery and repair utilities are useless, anyway. >:o
Oh yes, and Dell, I really appreciate the fact that you messed with my Dell Install disc, so it will only install Home Premium, even tho ...
Fujitsu, I can't thank you enough for hijacking my Vista Reinstall disc with your "Recovery" tools, so that I can't use it to actually r ...
Nothing like a good (virtual) housecleaning to cheer the heart. I'm doing a fresh install/upgrade to V. Ultimate on my PC.
♥♥ Windows Vista ♥♥ So easy to install, so fast, so beautiful and perfect...
Finished Installing Vista for Bro. Works great, so far. Very pleased.
Tomorrow, will install Vista on bro's computer. Should be pretty fun, actually...
Finished Setting up sis's new netbook. All ready to go except campus wireless. Wish I could do that too, but it's in another city...
Got bro's senior pics 2day. Was forced to realize that bro is actually very grownup & sexy. *Shudder* Now scrubs brain w/bleach.
Some kind individual plowed our driveway on monday. No idea who, but thank you. We really appreciate it.
♥ my tablet. So handy for troubleshooting other computers. Just Google & Go. Can't boot other computer, or get online? no problem.
Cold, Cold, Cold!
